text: ^ cc <@U3SHN6Z3K> <@U22PJPGK0> Ideally, agencies and super nerdy people like me would be able to filter out visits and contacts based on “Advanced Segments”, like Google Analytics. - Just a thought - or you could use the HubSpot reporting add on or something like databox to create visual reports with just the data you want, which would/could remove visits/contacts that don’t fit XYZ criteria. :slightly_smiling_face:  - email me at <mailto:jason@thedsmgroup.com|jason@thedsmgroup.com> if you want more info on this. Happy to help!
Thanks. I’ll pass along that feedback
